category.oseca.name: Old Swing, Eye Candy, & Animations
gui.oseca.settings.title: Old Swing, Eye Candy, & Animations Settings
gui.oseca.customize.reset.@Tooltip[0]: This will delete all items within the list.
gui.oseca.customize.reset.@Tooltip[1]: Click the reset checkmark to enable this button.
gui.oseca.customize.add.@Tooltip: Add the item typed in the input box.
gui.oseca.customize.autofill.@Tooltip: Add the item in your character's hand.
gui.oseca.customize.remove.@Tooltip: Delete %s from the customized speed list.
text.autoconfig.oseca.title: General Settings
text.autoconfig.oseca.option.sounds.atta:
§bDisable all attack sounds like sweeping
and critical hits.
text.autoconfig.oseca.option.eyeCandy.ol:
§bBring back the old Minecraft version
overlay on the HUD.

§bBring back the old button hovering by
removing the §fwhite §bborder and adding
§eyellow §btext with a §9blue §bbackground.

§eThis will §doverride §etexture pack buttons
when §aenabled§e.

§bBring back the old durability bar
colors.

§bBring back the old item holding and
swinging position.

§bDisable item entities from merging.
§cThis does not work in multiplayer yet.

§bBring back the old 2D floating items.

§eThis will "simulate" items being in
2D to maintain mod compatibility.

§bDisable the flickering of light from
light emitting sources.

§eIt is recommended to combine this feature
with an old lighting resource pack.
§bAn animation modifier that changes how
fast an item will appear after a swing
or change in slot.

§bThe modern logic that controls the animation
that plays when an item in the player's hand
changes.

§eIf set to §cno§e, the classic reequipping
logic will be §aenabled§e.

§bA particle animation that appears after
attacking an entity with a sword.

§bA subtle animation that is applied to
the arm when you look around.

§bA smooth animation that is applied when
sneaking.

§bA subtle animation that is applied to
the arm and viewing distance when
trying to move while colliding with
a block.

§bA subtle animation that is applied
to the arm and viewing distance when
jumping or falling.

§bA swinging animation that occurs when
dropping an item on the ground.

§bA disintegration animation and breaking
sound that happens when a tool runs
out of durability.
text.autoconfig.oseca.option.swings.tool:
The higher the swing number is the slower the swinging animation will be.§r

§aAlpha/Beta Minecraft§f: §b8
§6Modern Minecraft§f: §b6

§eIf you are photosensitive, it is recommended to set speeds to 0.
text.autoconfig.oseca.option.swings.item:
The swing speed of items that are not
blocks, swords, or tools.
text.autoconfig.oseca.option.swings.hast:
Override swing speed when haste is applied.
§eSet this to §c-1 §eto §cdisable§e.
text.autoconfig.oseca.option.swings.mini:
Override swing speed when mining fatigue is applied.
§eSet this to §c-1 §eto §cdisable§e.
text.autoconfig.oseca.option.swings.glob:
§bThis value will override §nany§r §bswing speed that does not match the given number.
§eSet this to §c-1 §eto §cdisable§e.
